import './singlePost.css' import axios from 'axios' import PIC from "../../images/neighborhood.JPEG" import { useLocation } from 'react-router' export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); const path = (location.pathname.split("/")[2]) useEffect(() => { const getPost = async()=> { const res = await axios.get("/posts/" + path); console.log(res) } getPost() }, [path]) return (
